body.p: The Standard does not establish any new principles for land related to agricultural activity. Rather, an entity follows IAS 16 Property, Plant and Equipment or IAS 40 Investment Property depending on which standard is appropriate in the circumstances. IAS 16 requires land to be measured either at its cost less any accumulated impairment losses, or at a revalued amount. IAS 40 requires land that is investment property to be measured at its fair value, or cost less any accumulated impairment losses.
